lead_paragraph: USA Gymnastics has hired a former attorney to review its procedures for handling sexual misconduct issues in the wake of media reports earlier this year that the organization turned a blind eye to allegations.

headline.print_headline: Gymnastics: U.S. Officials to Review Sexual Misconduct Policy
headline.main: Gymnastics: U.S. Officials to Review Sexual Misconduct Policy
